ja428:0.1_0: The group of twelve on “as expected”
ja428:1.1_0: “A curse these two parts are like ascetics,
ja428:1.2_0: No-one thinks they are a fool.
ja428:1.4_0: none thought another to be better.
ja428:10.2_0: For there is no friendship with fools.
ja428:10.3_0: Wander alone and do no bad,
ja428:10.4_0: Unconcerned, like a bull elephant in the forest.”
ja428:11.1_0: The second group of Kosambī is finished.
ja428:2.4_0: and no-one knows what leads them on.
ja428:3.3_0: For those who carry on like this,
ja428:4.3_0: For those who do not carry on like this,
ja428:5.1_0: The threat of enmity and enmity,
ja428:5.3_0: Only by love does it stop—
ja428:5.4_0: This is the Teaching by an ancient.
ja428:8.1_0: If you do get a discerning friend,
ja428:8.4_0: And go with them, glad and mindful.
ja428:9.1_0: If you do not get a discerning friend,
ja428:9.3_0: Then like a king giving up his kingdom,
ja428:9.4_0: Wander alone like a bull elephant in the forest.
